And it's just another layer of everyday life that you absorb into your skin, that others can't possibly understand - that extra weight
Heart sinks and you sympathise and try to shrug it off and carry on eating because that's all you can do
your hijabi friend tells you about getting spat at & another mate talks about seeing 'Chinese out' graffiti on the bus back home
Sometimes I feel like I live in a parallel universe to the rest of the country where in between mouthfuls of papaya salad
